oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Original wills, Ballard, W. B., 1923 August 02
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An original will of W. B. Ballard, dated April 3rd, 1923. Illustrates a page of the document. Ballard’s will was presented for probate to the Davidson County Court on August 2nd, 1923. Includes an envelope with the address of “W. B. Ballard, Attorney at Law, 411 1-2 Union Street, Nashville, Tennessee.” Forms part of Record Group 16, Original Wills, 1780-1925.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Ballard family
